title: STUNNING 2BR UNIT IN JP! WITH AMAZING DEALS GOING ON!
posting_body: Live in Jamaica Plain in a brand new luxury space that won’t break the bank, is full of top of the line amenities, has a local neighborhood vibe, and so much more!
Enjoy JP’s newest luxury apartment complex, a place with walkability, bikeability, and orange line access for easy commutability and peace of mind.
With Franklin Park, Southwest Corridor Park, and Arnold Arboretum nearby, you are sure to relax in nature!
Love going out?
This unit is near the Brewery complex (including Sam Adams!), amazing coffee at Video Underground, and Doyle’s cafe!!
There is so much in this area!!!
The unit features laminate flooring, stainless steel appliances, and a washer/dryer in unit!
Want to relax outside of your apartment?
There are plenty of building features as well - including a roof lounge, library, and an indoor fireplace!
Building Features:
-Conference room
-Library
-Roof lounge w/ gas grills
-Spacious interior courtyard with firepit and ample seating
-Fitness room
-Garage parking available for rent
-Pet friendly!
Pet wash available (additional fee may apply)
Unit Features:
-Stainless steel appliances
-Oversized windows
-Laminate flooring
-In unit commercial size W/D
-EVERY unit has a balcony-- even studios!!!!
-Self contained AC and Heating systems with multiple zones
Every studio layout is built with an alcove for dedicated sleep space, out of site for your guests!
MY FULL FEE PAID BY DEVELOPER!
*Pricing, brokerage coverage, and availability subject to change without notice based on availability, lease term, and move-in date selected.
Effective rent listed above.
Pictures may be of similar unit, could cause minor changes to finishes unit to unit.
The apartment advertised may no longer be available for rent.
